not_found.parragraph2: Page you are trying to access is unavailable or has been moved.
not_found.parragraph3: Try returning to the home page.

login.error-login: An error has occurred while you were trying to access, please retry later.

error.load-data: An error has occurred while data was loading, please retry later.

error.txt-url-invalid: The URL format is invalid. Make sure to include http:// or https://
error.add-link: An error has occurred while saving your shortened link, please retry later.
